parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.21

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the type of a given marker. See [[cfgMarkers]] for a list of standard markers.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>[[String]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>  '''getMarkerType''' markerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]. See [[cfgMarkers]].

If the marker does not exist, the returned type is an empty string, ie ""
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>"MarkerOne" setMarkerType "Destroy"

_type = getMarkerType "MarkerOne"</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

returns "Destroy"

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[cfgMarkers]], [[markerType]], [[setMarkerType]], [[setMarkerTypeLocal]]
</value></part></template>
